coreAttributes.name: dull demon crystal
coreAttributes.description: This crystal is said to have been crystallised from a Lilin's tears. Its arcane nature allows it to be absorbed into someone's aura to grant them the ability to cast a ranged attack using conjured swords. This particular crystal is in rough shape, limiting its power.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Use your crystal's power to attack [npc2.name] with three floating blades of energy.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on the energy in the arcane crystal. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it dissolves and flows into [npc.her] aura, granting [npc.herHim] the ability to perform arcane-sword attacks at range.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(focus)] on extracting the absorbed arcane energy inside of [npc.her] aura. As [npc.she] [npc.does] so, it reforms back into an arcane crystal.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Thrusting [npc.her] [npc.arm] out in front of [npc.herHim], three swords of arcane energy materialises around [npc.namePos] [npc.arm], before shooting out to strike [npc2.name]!
Making a quick forwards thrust with [npc.her] [npc.arm], a trio of arcane energy swords shoots out of [npc.namePos] [npc.hand] to strike [npc2.name]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] [npc.arm] at [npc2.name], causing a sword of arcane energy to fly out and hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting [npc.her] [npc.arm] out in front of [npc.herHim], three swords of arcane energy materialises around [npc.namePos] [npc.arm], before shooting out and narrowly missing [npc2.name]!
Making a quick forwards thrust with [npc.her] [npc.arm], a trio of arcane energy swords shoots out of [npc.namePos] [npc.hand] to narrowly miss [npc2.name]!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] [npc.arm] at [npc2.name], causing a sword of arcane energy to fly out and narrowly miss [npc2.herHim]!
